transcript: [Music] Happy Halloween. When the lights go out and when it's dark, when you look for something brighter, but you can't even see a spark. When it's dark, we'll shine a light into the night. Into the night. Oh, don't be scared. It's all right. I'll look after you always. >> It's going to be okay. It's going to be okay. >> Don't worry.
